channel.title: REST :: CIS 526 Textbook
channel.description: We’ve already seen that with our blog, we could convey which post to display with different URL strategies, i.e.: http://my-blog.com/posts?id=5 http://my-blog.com/posts/5 http://my-blog.com/posts/5-a-night-that-was-dark And that is just to display posts. What about when we want our blog software to allow the writer to submit new posts? Or edit existing ones? That’s a lot of different URLS we’ll need to keep track of. Representational State Transfer (REST) Roy Fielding tackled this issue in Chapter 5 of his Ph.
